Labels.Value: = "Claus BÃ¶hmer"       de.kdac.confluence.authors = "eso@bistum-eichstaett.de"       de.kdac.confluence.url = "https://hub.docker.com/r/kidac/confluence"       de.kdac.confluence.documentation = "https://hub.docker.com/r/kidac/confluence"       de.kdac.confluence.source = "https://github.com/kidac/confluence"       de.kdac.confluence.version = "6.13.9"       de.kdac.confluence.vendor = "KDAC - https://ews.kdac.de"       de.kdac.confluence.licenses = "https://www.atlassian.com/legal/software-license-agreement, https://www.atlassian.com/legal/privacy-policy"       de.kdac.confluence.title = "Atlassian Confluence (KDAC Version)"       de.kdac.confluence.description = "Adapted Atlassians Confluence Dockerfile used by https://ews.kdac.de"

CmdLine: apk --no-cache upgrade  && apk add --no-cache bash curl ghostscript motif ttf-dejavu tini  && fc-cache -f
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir -p ${CONFLUENCE_INSTALL_DIR}  && curl -jkSL ${DOWNLOAD_URL} | tar -xz --strip-components=1 -C "$CONFLUENCE_INSTALL_DIR"  && chown -R ${RUN_USER}:${RUN_GROUP} ${CONFLUENCE_INSTALL_DIR}/  && sed -i -e 's/port="8090"/port="8090" secure="${catalinaConnectorSecure}" scheme="${catalinaConnectorScheme}" proxyName="${catalinaConnectorProxyName}" proxyPort="${catalinaConnectorProxyPort}"/' ${CONFLUENCE_INSTALL_DIR}/conf/server.xml  && sed -i -e 's/Context path=""/Context path="${catalinaContextPath}"/' ${CONFLUENCE_INSTALL_DIR}/conf/server.xml  && ln -s /usr/lib/libfontconfig.so.1 /usr/lib/libfontconfig.so  && ln -s /lib/libuuid.so.1 /usr/lib/libuuid.so.1  && ln -s /lib/libc.musl-x86_64.so.1 /usr/lib/libc.musl-x86_64.so.1  && sed -i -e 's/-Xms\([0-9]\+[kmg]\) -Xmx\([0-9]\+[kmg]\)/-Xms\${JVM_MINIMUM_MEMORY:=\1} -Xmx\${JVM_MAXIMUM_MEMORY:=\2} \${JVM_SUPPORT_RECOMMENDED_ARGS} -Dconfluence.home=\${CONFLUENCE_HOME}/g' ${CONFLUENCE_INSTALL_DIR}/bin/setenv.sh
Commands.Name: run
